TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IPHostEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a container class for Internet host address information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> class associates a Domain Name System (DNS) host name with an array of aliases and an array of matching IP addresses.
The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> class is used as a helper class with the <xref:System.Net.Dns> class.
## Examples The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host `www.contoso.com` and returns the information in an <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> instance.
[!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a list of IP addresses that are associated with a host.
Docs.value: An array of type that contains IP addresses that resolve to the host names that are contained in the property.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList%2A> property to access the IP addresses that are associated with the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the DNS name of the host.
Docs.value: A string that contains the primary host name for the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A> property contains the primary host name for a server. If the DNS entry for the server defines additional aliases, they will be available in the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases%2A> property.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A> property to retrieve the primary host name.
[!code-cpp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CPP/iphostentry_addresslist.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/CS/iphostentry_addresslist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPHostEntry_AddressList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPHostEntry_AddressList/VB/iphostentry_addresslist.vb#1)]
